LightningComponentBundle.description: This component enables to display a path within a Flow, e.g. to follow/control flow steps.

property.name: pathClass
property.label: Wrapping CSS Class
property.description: CSS Classes for the wrapping div

property.name: stepsConfig
property.label: List of Steps (JSON)
property.description: JSON stringified string array alternative to 'List of Steps' (for simpler config.)

property.name: mode
property.label: Display Mode
property.description: Should be one of the following possibilities: 'path', 'progress', 'tab', or 'button'

property.name: triggerNext
property.label: Trigger Next?
property.description: If selected, updates currentStep and triggers Next event

property.name: alignment
property.label: Alignment
property.description: In case of 'button' display, controls the alignment of the buttons (should have 'center', 'start' or 'end' value).

property.name: hasTopBorder
property.label: Top Border?
property.description: In case of 'button' display, adds a top border above the button, to emulate a custom footer
